title: How to get the vendor sell price?

comments.author: Mystic.5934
comments.body:
IFAIK, there are no API results for things sold from merchants.
maybe there will be one in the future, Lawton would know better than I :P
until then, I created my own. They are available here:
http://gw2profits.com/json/v3?disciplines=Merchant
I didn’t include all items, only those that were used in other recipes and are not temporary (unless they are only available during those temporary times. ex: candy corn cob). If you needed it, sorry I didn’t include which merchant it’s available from.
hope that helps!

comments.author: tconley.1789
comments.body:
Alright, thanks! I think the items I’m most interested in (things like spools of thread) might be exceptions to that rule but I’ll check them out.

Thanks for continuing to develop new endpoints! The API is very convenient.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: By default, yeah. The vendor prices can be overridden on a vendor-by-vendor basis. There’s a vendor endpoint that’s not available yet that (kind of) exposes the actual prices.
